entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 1 except low minus 8 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1 except low minus 8 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 21 January 2023
